headline: The Take; City Sounds
abstract: We sent four photographers to capture New York’s soundscape in images. Here’s what they saw (and heard).
lead_paragraph: Daniel Arnold found this screeching Times Square performer (above), a fixture in one of the most claustrophobic corners of the city. “In my imagination she’s always been a defiant and sarcastic response to the Naked Cowboy,” Arnold said, referring to the neighborhood’s scantily clad guitarist. How would he describe the sound she makes? “Blaaaahhhhhhhhh!!!”
